question: “Lectures from Colombo to Almora” is based on the experiences of which one of the following?
explanation: Swami Vivekananda, born Narendranath Datta, was an Indian Hindu monk, a chief disciple of the 19th-century Indian mystic Ramakrishna. Lectures from Colombo to Almora is a book of Swami Vivekananda based on his various lectures.
